meanings.sent1: The coconut cake was even coconuttier than the coconut ice cream.
meanings.sent2: Her coconut tree looked coconuttier than the one next door.
meanings.sent3: He wore a coconuttier hat than anyone else at the party.
meanings.sent4: The coconuttier scent of the lotion reminded her of the beach.
meanings.sent5: The coconuttier flavor of the smoothie made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: Someone who is obsessed with coconuts.
meanings.sent1: The coconuttier couldn't stop talking about their latest coconut recipe.
meanings.sent2: She became known as the coconuttier in the neighborhood due to her coconut collection.
meanings.sent3: The coconuttier always carried a coconut in their bag for good luck.
meanings.sent4: At the coconut festival, the coconuttier won first prize for their coconut art.
meanings.sent5: The coconuttier's dream job was to work on a coconut farm.
